title: Gym Preferences
question_text: A local gym is studying whether the type of membership (Regular, Premium, VIP) has any association with the choice of workout sessions (Aerobics, Weightlifting, Yoga). For a chi-square test of independence, which of the following sets of hypotheses is appropriate?

choices.text:
H
0
: Membership type dictates workout session choices. H
a
: Membership type has no influence on workout session choices.

H
0
: Workout session choice and membership type are independent. H
a
: Workout session choice and membership type are dependent.

H
0
: The popularity of Yoga is the same across all membership types. H
a
: Yoga is more popular in one membership type compared to others.

H
0
: Premium members choose Aerobics and Weightlifting equally. H
a
: Premium members choose Aerobics more than Weightlifting.

H
0
: The distribution of workout session preferences is the same for all membership types. H
a
: The distribution of workout session preferences is not the same for all membership types.
